title: Request Additional Labor to Accelerate Schedule
description: To get back on schedule after a delay, a project manager needs to request two additional carpenters for the framing crew for one week.

tasks.description: Analyze the framing task to determine if adding labor will decrease its duration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that the task is labor-intensive and can be accelerated.

tasks.description: Submit a request to the resource manager for two additional carpenters for a specific one-week period.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal resource request is sent.
